room_title: Escape room "The Hideout" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Sarasota
review: It was an amazing experience. It was challenging but great.

room_title: Escape room "The Hideout" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Sarasota
review: Everything about Escape Rooms Unlocked is a great experience. The rooms are addictive for puzzle lovers like myself and a combination of challenging but family friendly (I have done one of them with a 6 year old). Besides the rooms, the staff is a huge reason why we keep coming back- they are friendly, knowledgeable and accommodating. So thankful to have a recreational gem like this in Charlotte County/ North Port!

room_title: Escape room "The Hideout" by Escape Rooms Unlocked in Sarasota
review: We ABSOLUTELY LOVE Escape Rooms Unlocked! We have done all their rooms and we were excited to do the new one-- The Hideout. It was awesome and just what we expected from this wonderful business-- they do rooms that flow nicely and give you a great challenge! Us 3 escaped with 11 minutes left-- the record for this new room! We are honored! Keep up the great job ERU... we'll be waiting for your next awesome room!
